sentences.sContent: In fleck corneal dystrophy, the lesion only involved stroma, epithelium and endothelium levels were normal.
sentences.sContent_eng: In fleck corneal dystrophy, the lesion only involved stroma, epithelium and endothelium levels were normal.
sentences.sCn: 斑点状角膜营养不良病变仅累及基质层，而角膜上皮层及内皮层正常；

sentences.sContent: Bell palsy (a type of neuritis) paralyzes the muscles of one side of the face. Muscular dystrophy causes paralysis by attacking muscle.
sentences.sContent_eng: Bell palsy (a type of neuritis) paralyzes the muscles of one side of the face. Muscular dystrophy causes paralysis by attacking muscle.
sentences.sCn: 贝尔氏麻痹（神经炎的一种）引起面部一侧的肌肉瘫痪。肌营养不良侵袭肌肉也能导致瘫痪。

remMethod.val: dys(坏) + troph(营养) + y → 营养不良

words.tran: 协同困难；[医] 协同失调

trans.tranCn: 营养障碍； 营养不良
